projects.title: Kensa
projects.description: Kensa is an open-source product I co-created with a few other engineers who all share a passion for GraphQL development. It equips developers with the metrics and tools necessary to monitor and test their GraphQL requests, always ensuring the health and performance of their server.

projects.title: tasksAI
projects.description: tasksAI is task-organization app that utilizes machine learning to help users boost productivity. Developed using React Native, Expo, NativeBase, GraphQL, Node.JS, Python, and Redux Toolkit.

projects.title: Meihua Stories
projects.description: I was given the opportunity to design and create this website for a Chinese short-story writer and poet. The site is developed with React, Gatsby, and Sass, to be fully responsive and highly performant.

projects.title: MonoJStick
projects.description: After discovering code golf on Clash of Code, my friend Jasper sponsored me to make a web app for people to submit their favorite JavaScript one-liners. To make sure the code submitted are valid, I've written an algorithm to ensure the one-liners submitted are indeed one-liners and valid JavaScript functions.

projects.title: Canterbury Gardens
projects.description: Canterbury Gardens is a brick-and-mortar store. I used WordPress and WooCommerce to rebuild the online eCommerce store and managed 10,000+ SKU. I've also used MailChimp to set up mailing list for advertising and marketing purposes.
